12.eng-name: The Book of The At-Tatbiq (Clasping One's Hands Together)

hadiths.text: It was narrated that Abi Qibalah said:"Abu Sulaiman Malik bin Al-Huwairith came to our masjid and said: "I want to show you how I saw the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) pray.'" He said: "He sat during the first Rak'ah when he raised his head from the second prostration

chapter.ara-name: باب الاِسْتِوَاءِ لِلْجُلُوسِ عِنْدَ الرَّفْعِ مِنَ السَّجْدَتَيْنِ
chapter.eng-name: Settling in a seated position after rising from the two prostrations
